content.title: Action Items by Category
Most Common Solutions

content.query:
let lookbackTime = 14d;
let bucketTimeSpan = 1h;
let maxTimeGeneratedBucket = toscalar(CyberpionActionItems_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(lookbackTime)| summarize max(bin(TimeGenerated, bucketTimeSpan)));
CyberpionActionItems_CL
 | where TimeGenerated > ago(lookbackTime) and is_open_b == true
 | extend TimeGeneratedBucket = bin(TimeGenerated, bucketTimeSpan)
 | where TimeGeneratedBucket == maxTimeGeneratedBucket
 | extend Urgency = bin(urgency_d, 1)
 | summarize count() by Urgency
 | join kind=rightouter (range Urgency from 1.0 to 10.0 step 1) on Urgency
 | project Urgency = Urgency1, Count = iff(isnotempty(count_), count_, 0)
 | sort by Urgency asc
 | extend Urgency = tostring(Urgency)
 | render barchart
content.title: Action Items Count by Urgency

content.query:
let lookbackTime = now(-{TimeRange:seconds}s);
let bucketTimeSpan = 1h;
CyberpionActionItems_CL
 | where TimeGenerated > lookbackTime and is_open_b == true
 | project id_s, TimeGenerated
 | make-series count() default=long(null) on TimeGenerated from bin(lookbackTime, bucketTimeSpan) to now() step bucketTimeSpan
 | extend open_action_items=series_fill_forward(count_, long(null))
 | project TimeGenerated, open_action_items
 | mv-expand TimeGenerated to typeof(datetime), open_action_items to typeof(int)
 | where isnotnull(open_action_items)
 | render timechart
content.title: Open Action Items over time
